titleStmt.title: Three papers presented to the Royal Society against Dr. Wallis together with considerations on Dr. Wallis his Answer to them / by Tho. Hobbes.
titleStmt.author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
Wallis, John, 1616-1703.

notesStmt.note: "To the Right Honorable and others, the learned members of the Royal Society for the Advancement of the Sciences" on leaf preceding t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
To the Right Honourable and others, the learned members of the Royal Society for the Advancement of the Sciences--Considerations upon the Answer of Dr. Wallis to the Three papers of Mr. Hobbes.
